endpoints.description: Initiate a new telemedicine consultation session with a healthcare provider.
Retrieve details of a specific consultation session using its unique identifier.
Update the information or status of an existing consultation session.
Retrieve a list of available healthcare providers for consultations.
Upload a medical document to associate it with a consultation session.
Access the content and details of a specific medical document.
Retrieve stored records of past consultations for a given patient.
Send a notification to remind patients about upcoming consultation sessions.
Generate aggregated analytics on consultations for performance reviews.
